name: GlucoSol® 800
description: GlucoSol® 800 polymer is a new entry in the Chemstar watersoluble product line. It is a highly substituted natural polysaccharide designed to impart enhanced functional properties including: solution stability, salt tolerance, surface activity, water retention, improved rheology and viscosity. GlucoSol® 800 offers a unique alternative to competitive natural and synthetic water-soluble polymers
